description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6bsv1","text":"This procedure describes a modified extraction procedure to isolate both DNA and RNA from wastewater samples using the QIAamp Fast DNA Stool MiniKit. The sample undergoes a lysate preparation process and includes mechanical disruption (bead beating), removal of inhibitors, purification and elution of DNA and RNA using spin columns. Extrinsic controls SPC and MS2 are added to each sample during the lysate preparation to evaluate extraction and amplification efficiency. The extracted total nucleic acid (TNA) is then stored at -80°C for testing. To rule out contamination during the extraction process, a blank is also processed through the complete protocol each day extractions are performed. Briefly, the procedure comprises the following steps:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7d011","text":"a. Lysis of and separation of impurities from sample pellets in InhibitEX buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br4j6","text":"b. Purification of DNA and RNA on QIAamp Mini spin columns. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ips4","text":"Add\t600 μl of ethanol (96–100%) to the lysate and mix by vortexing. Centrifuge briefly to remove drops from the inside of the tube lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fh3ab","text":"For samples processed by Nanotrap‱ A microbiome particles: Follow the steps described in the referenced protocol as described in the guidelines above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"70595C86458011EF83F90A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92h2g","text":" Add both extraction controls to the tube, and then add    Inhibitex buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"5A097A34458511EF9C3B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2j9mv","text":"Centrifuge the samples at full speed (approximately 20,000g) for   to pellet the particles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"8EFE0566458511EF9C3B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dljaf","text":"Centrifuge at full speed for   . Retain the spin column and discard the flow-through and collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"E876023A458511EF9C3B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kh0h","text":"For pellets derived from other wastewater sample concentration methods: Resuspend the pellet in   of sterile PBS, and add 1ml of this suspension to 2ml Screw Cap Micro Tubes containing   ~   (one 2 ml eppendorf tube capful) of acid-washed glass beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":96,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":189,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dhd1q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"370","error":false,"guid":"CED0C4EC458011EF9C3B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}}}}
